SearchableReferenceDocument.name: SearchableReferenceDocument
SearchableReferenceDocument.description: Represents documents that are referenced to search for answers during documentation authoring, such as ESG disclosures.

ContentDocumentId.description: The content document that's indexed and made available for search.

Description.description: The description of the received document.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the referenced document.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ReportingYear.description: Specifies the year in which the disclosure document was uploaded.

UsageType.description: Specifies the type of usage that defines if the uploaded file for indexing is related to disclosure and compliance hub.
